          <title>
            <string language="en">Blocking of magnetic attraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blocken der magnetischen Anziehung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Blocage de l'attraction magnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Obstrução da atração magnética</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ostruendo dell'attrazione magnetica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φράξιμο μαγνητικής έλξης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bloqueo de la atracción magnética</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an iron sheet blocking the magnetic attraction between the paper clip and the magnet.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic attraction</string>
          </keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Eisenblatt, welches die 
magnetische Anziehung zwischen der Papierklammer und dem Magneten 
blockt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une feuille de fer 
bloquant l'attraction magnétique entre le trombone et l'aimant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma folha do ferro que 
obstrui a atração magnética entre o grampo de papel e o ímã.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un foglio del ferro 
che ostruisce l'attrazione magnetica fra la clip di carta ed il 
magnete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει φύλλο σιδήρου που 
εμποδίζει τη μαγνητική έλξη μεταξύ του συνδετήρα εγγράφου και 
του μαγνήτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una hoja del hierro que 
bloquea la atracción magnética entre el clip de papel y el imán.</string>
          </description>
